name: Bruce is Back
text: You must flip to alter-ego form. Exhaust your identity. Discard this obligation. “What the hell?” [hazard]

name: Hostile Takeover
text: “So he sould be cooperative to our... overtures. If not, we will have to persuade him.” Each [[criminal ]]enemy gets +1 SCH and +1 ATK. (Joe Fixit’s nemesis side scheme.) [hazard]

name: Kingpin
text: Toughness. Kingpin cannot take damage while you are engaged with another minion. (Joe Fixit’s nemesis minion.)

name: Rival Gang
text: “Are you bulletproof?” Hinder 2[per_hero]. Each minion gains the [[the maggia ]]trait and teamwork ([[the maggia]]). [star] Boost: Put Rival Gang into play. [acceleration]

name: Elektro
text: When Revealed: Stun a character you control. When defeated: Remove 2 threat from a scheme. “Chow time.”

name: Hydro-man
text: This minion can only take damage from cards with a printed [energy] resource. When defeated: Remove 2 threat from a scheme. “Bring it on!” -Joe
